name: sanity-orb-backend
description: Backend API for Internet Sanity Orb

scripts.db:init: psql $DATABASE_URL -f migrations/init.sql 2>/dev/null || psql $(echo $DATABASE_URL | sed 's|postgresql://||' | sed 's|postgres://||') -f migrations/init.sql 2>/dev/null || echo 'Please set DATABASE_URL in .env and ensure PostgreSQL is running'
scripts.db:reset: echo 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user_analytics, snapshots, sessions CASCADE;' | psql $DATABASE_URL && npm run db:init
